content.section: Machine Gun is a tier 2 tank that can be selected upon reaching level 15, and at tier 3, can be upgraded into "Destroyer" or "Gunner". At level 45 it can upgrade straight into "Sprayer". It features 1 trapezoid barrel at the front of the tank body. The bullet damage of Machine Gun is nerfed compared to Basic Tank, but is stronger than twin's bullets. It has a high reload increase and a large spread. Much like the Twin, it is a strong tank to use up to level 45.

- The high reload and spread of this tank is useful for overwhelming opponents with lower reload. By jittering your cursor (or shoooting wheel in mobile) slightly in front of the tank you can further increase the spread, minimising your opponents options for escape. - The high reload also serves as good recoil, allowing this class to be used as a rammer.

- The Machine Gun has the 2nd largest tier 2 branch out of the 4, with 9 possible level 45 upgrades. - The achievement for upgrading to Machine Gun is "Eat those bullets". - Machine Gun was the eighth tank to be added to the game, after Sniper; with its ID being '7'. - In one of the oldest versions, Machin Gun used to upgrade into itself at level 30, and again at level 45. This however had no added benefits. - The Machine Gun was nerfed after the Sprayer was released.
